
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VCtlEncoder2to10.cpp
          VCtlEncoder2to10.h
          VCtlEncoder2to10__Syms.cpp
          VCtlEncoder2to10__Syms.h
  DEPENDS CtlEncoder2to10.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CtlEncoder2to10.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VCtlEncoder2to10 STATIC VCtlEncoder2to10.cpp VCtlEncoder2to10__Syms.cpp
    CtlEncoder2to10.v
)

target_compile_options(VCtlEncoder2to10 PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VCtlEncoder2to10 PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VCtlEncoder2to10 verilated)
